title: Students can now apply for funding for 2020
text:
The online applications for the 2020 National Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS) will be open from 1 September to 30 November.

To be eligible for this funding for university and TVET college studies, applicants should be a South African citizen, enroll at any of the 26 public universities or 50 TVET colleges in 2020, come from a family with a combined household income of not more than R350 000 per annum, and if you are a student with a disability and come from a family with an income of not more than R600 000 per annum.

Students must be admitted and register for a funded qualification for 2020.

The NSFAS assesses the financial eligibility of students, while institutions make admissions decisions.
